references.paper_title: nuScenes: A multimodal dataset for autonomous driving
references.reason: This paper introduces a widely used and important dataset for autonomous driving research, providing a benchmark for evaluating various methods.

references.paper_title: Transfuser: Imitation with transformer-based sensor fusion for autonomous driving
references.reason: This paper proposes Transfuser, a significant baseline model for end-to-end autonomous driving that the current work builds upon and improves.

references.paper_title: Diffusion policy: Visuomotor policy learning via action diffusion
references.reason: This paper introduces the core concept of diffusion models for robotic policy learning, which the current work adapts to autonomous driving.

references.paper_title: NavSim: Data-driven non-reactive autonomous vehicle simulation and benchmarking
references.reason: This paper introduces the NavSim dataset, a key benchmark used for evaluating the performance of the proposed method.

references.paper_title: VADv2: End-to-end vectorized autonomous driving via probabilistic planning
references.reason: This paper presents a state-of-the-art approach that the current work aims to surpass by using diffusion models.
